channel.title: [Read] If you're having the red X problem
channel.description:
[b]Hi, i've seen many topics about people getting the red X in the top corner of the screen. So I just want to clear it up how to fix it. This is usually caused by not having the latest version of Java.[/b]
NOTE: Install MoparScape first. Click [url=http://uppit.com/NCD3S]here[/url] to download it. :)
1) Make sure you've got the letest version of JRE or JDK (6). If you haven't click [url=http://www.java.com/downloads]here[/url] to download it.
2) Re-open MoparScape, click run and it should work. Please I suggest you use the download version of MoparScape.
3) (Not really needed) If Your MoparScape windows closes please close ALL open web browsers.
If you have any questions please post them and if i can i'll help. Thanks. :)
REMEMBER: To make it faster for me to answer you please don't say something like "Still hasn't worked" could you be more specific. I.E "I need help on..." Thanks! :)
[b]Please[/b] [u][b]DON'T[/b][/u] [b]spam this thread. Thanks![/b] :)
Also if this hasn't helped you please [u][b]tell me[/b][/u] what's wrong! Thanks! :)

item.title: [Read] If you're having the red X problem
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

[quote=“Mopar Helper, post:43, topic:83531”][quote author=99 stats owns link=topic=122759.msg1200847#msg1200847 date=1177287157]
Hi, i’ve seen many topics about people getting the red X in the top corner of the screen. So I just want to clear it up how to fix it. This is usually caused by not having the latest version of Java.

NOTE: Install MoparScape first. Click here to download it.

  1. Make sure you’ve got the letest version of JRE or JDK (6). If you haven’t click here to download it.

  2. Re-open MoparScape, click run and it should work. Please I suggest you use the download version of MoparScape.

  3. (Not really needed) If Your MoparScape windows closes please close ALL open web browsers.

If you have any questions please post them and if i can i’ll help. Thanks.

REMEMBER: To make it faster for me to answer you please don’t say something like “Still hasn’t worked” could you be more specific. I.E “I need help on…” Thanks!

Please DON’T spam this thread. Thanks!

Also if this hasn’t helped you please tell me what’s wrong! Thanks!

[/quote]
This should be in Server development/help?[/quote]I Agree

Read full topic
